title: Do RIOT have any idea how many changes they make to this game
body:
This is getting silly, if you play game on and off its impossible to keep up. 
You need a LOL doctorate to know this  game.

replies.body:
or you know, you can read the pbe patch notes on surrender at 20 and be aware of major changes 2 weeks in advance.

Everytime a new patch hits my winrate gets a slight bump because ive known all the changes for a solid week or two and already know how to deal with it.
It's preseason though, this is the time when they add a whole bunch of changes to give people time to learn, rather than doing it half way through season 6.

It does get awkward trying to get friends who have not played a while to have a game or two a year only to have to say that things have changed so much since they last logged in. Sure they would rather do something else with their time in the first place but it really doesn't encourage people to stick around if things keep changing.
